column2: "P-peon! What are you doing here? More importantly, did you see me?"
"1. You're standing in front of me"
"2. I don't see anyone, do you?"
"I did my best to sneak my way out here, and my cover got blown!"
"Now listen good, peon, I'm not here, you don't see me, got it?"
"I don't want anyone knowing that I'm here, so if anyone finds out, I'm going to blow you up good."
"Hey, peon! Have you lost your mind, I'm standing right in front of you!"
"It looks like I'll just have to blow you to bits to keep this a secret!"
"What? You won't tell anyone? Okay, I'll believe you, but if you say anything, you're in for a thousand years of pain!"
"You absolutely must not tell anyone what I'm doing here."
"... That is to say, I came here to patrol. Just like everyone else."
"I've been ordered to stand by. So, I shouldn't be here, I just thought that it was odd..."
"...Don't you think so? As part of the Three Heroes, why wouldn't we be out here?"
"Even though we're the Three Heroes, and we should be out there like everyone else, we're told to stand by."
"Anyway, why am I telling this to you? Forget what you heard just now, peon!"
"Like I said, don't you dare think about telling this to anyone!"
